Support

How to Register

Enter www.Risino.com , press Registration button, and fill in all necessary fields to complete the registration process

  1. Enter first name
  2. Enter last name
  3. Enter e mail address
  4. The next field is meant for entering your password which you wish to use while entering the system
  5. Select your nationality
  6. Enter Address
  7. Enter Phone
  8. Enter Mobile
  9. Social Network
  10. Enter Date of birth
  11. Indicate Sex
  12. And approve

Fields with asterisks are necessary to be filled in. Also, please be very attentive while completing your personal number and e-mail address.

Please confirm the completed fields after filling in the form by pressing the Registration button and go to the email indicated to activate your account/ or fill the box "SMS Code" with the code you receive on your phone number.

Editing Your Profile

Open online.risino.com, enter your username and password indicated during the process of registration, click Enter. The button My Account will appear in the upper right-hand corner which is necessary to be accessed to change your personal profile information. Press the Edit Your Profile button afterwards.

The appeared fields can be edited per your wish.

Name can be changed in the first field and Surname in the second field. Country and City can be modified in the third and the following fourth fields respectively. The next entries that can be changed are for Living Address, ZIP Code which is the same as Post Index, Telephone and Contact Phone numbers. The following fields are for Sex, Date of Birth M/Y/D and Security Question together with the Answer to it.

Finally, the active entry password is typed in. Changes should be confirmed by hitting the Renew button and all modified information will be successfully saved in your profile.

Changing Password

Open online.risino.com, enter your username and password indicated during the process of registration, click Enter. After the authorization process is completed successfully the button My Account will appear in the upper right-hand corner which is necessary to be accessed to change the password.

Choose the Change Password function in the personal panel and click the button. Three fields will appear on the screen which should be completed accordingly.

Type your active password which is valid now of completion. Enter the new password you wish to use to get access to your Europe-bet.com account in the second field. In the third field, you must retype he password which you have already entered in the second field. Changes will become valid after confirmation.

Information about the password change will accordingly appear on the screen.

How to make money transfer

Purchase voucher of certain amount, Login in your account, enter barcode, activate your voucher and start to play

Where can you buy vouchers?

Casino International Batumi

Rustaveli 40

Batumi Georgia Hilton Hotel second floor (please visit our Casino cash desk)

Coliseum Marina Hotel

Oasis Hotel Chakvi

Cash out Procedure

You should come to Casino International Batumi (address Rustaveli street 40 Hilton Hotel second floor, Batumi, Georgia) with your ID/Passport and get your win.
